sourcesContent:
<template>
    <!-- <Line :data="chartData" :options="chartOptions" /> -->
    {{ chartData }}
</template>

<script>
import {
    Chart as ChartJS,
    CategoryScale,
    LinearScale,
    PointElement,
    LineElement,
    Title,
    Tooltip,
    Legend
} from 'chart.js'
// import { Line } from 'vue-chartjs'

ChartJS.register(
    CategoryScale,
    LinearScale,
    PointElement,
    LineElement,
    Title,
    Tooltip,
    Legend
)

export default {
    name: 'BarChart',
    // components: { Line },
    props: {
        chartData: {
            type: Object,
            required: true
        }
    },
   data() {
       return {
           chartOptions: {
               //min scale to 1 and step is 1
                //make the point to color red
                plugins: {
                    legend: {
                        display: false
                    }
                },

                responsive: true,
                maintainAspectRatio: false,
                scales: {
                     y: {
                          min: 0,
                          ticks: {
                            stepSize: 1
                          }
                     }
                },
           }
       }
   }
}
</script>
